listening_lessons.title: Morning Routine
listening_lessons.text: Every morning, I wake up at 6 AM. I brush my teeth, take a shower, and have breakfast. Then, I go to work by bus.

listening_lessons.text: Last weekend, I went to the mountains with my friends. We hiked all day and enjoyed the fresh air. At night, we sat around a campfire and told stories.

listening_lessons.title: Job Interview Tips
listening_lessons.text: In a job interview, it is important to be confident and prepared. Research the company, dress professionally, and practice answering common questions.

listening_lessons.title: Healthy Eating
listening_lessons.text: Eating healthy food is important for our body. We should eat more fruits and vegetables and drink enough water every day.

listening_lessons.text: I go to the supermarket every Saturday. I buy fresh vegetables, fruits, and some snacks for the week. Sometimes, I also get a new book from the store next to it.

listening_lessons.text: Last summer, my family and I went to the beach. We swam in the ocean, built sandcastles, and enjoyed seafood at a nearby restaurant.

listening_lessons.title: A Visit to the Doctor
listening_lessons.text: I had a fever last week, so I went to the doctor. The doctor checked my temperature and gave me some medicine. Now, I feel much better.

listening_lessons.text: I love painting in my free time. I usually paint landscapes and animals. It helps me relax and express my creativity.

listening_lessons.title: A School Project
listening_lessons.text: This week, my class is working on a science project. We are building a small volcano model using baking soda and vinegar. It is fun and exciting!

listening_lessons.text: Last month, I visited a new city for the first time. I explored the local markets, tried new foods, and took many pictures.
